What is the full name of the HAID resour: What is the primary mission of the HAID project?
To democratize access to high-quality, preprocessed medical imaging datasets for AI/ML development in medical imaging.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: HAID provides ready-to-use annotations for which three primary AI/ML tasks?
For reproducible benchmarking, what kind of data splits does HAID provide?
The NSCLC-Radiomics (NSCLCR) dataset contains CT scans of patients from which country?
What specific type of cancer is the focus of the NSCLC-Radiomics (NSCLCR) dataset?
In the NSCLC-Radiomics dataset, what is the specific name for the tumor segmentation provided?
The train/validation/test splits for the NSCLC-Radiomics dataset are stratified by what clinical feature?
What is the primary condition studied in the UniToChest dataset?
The UniToChest dataset, originating from Italy, contains over 10,000 expert-annotated _____ _____.
What specific imaging condition is the focus of the IMDCT dataset?
A key feature of the IMDCT dataset is that 100% of diagnoses have _____ confirmation, considered the gold standard.
The IMDCT dataset, from multiple institutions in China, has a high malignancy rate of what percentage?
What is the distinguishing feature of the annotations in the LNDb v4 dataset from Portugal?
It features multi-reader annotations, with up to 4 expert radiologists per case.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The LNDb v4 dataset includes ratings for 9 radiological characteristics, such as Texture, Calcification, and _____.
Malignancy (or Subtlety, Lobulation, Margin, Sphericity, Spiculation, Internal Structure).

What is the full name of the HAID resour: What unique textual data is included with the BIMCV-R dataset from Spain?
Bilingual radiology reports (Spanish original and English machine-translated).

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The BIMCV-R dataset is described as having rich multi-label annotations. What is the most prevalent finding, present in 34.4% of cases?
What was the specific goal of the challenge associated with the LUNGx dataset?
How were the diagnoses in the LUNGx dataset confirmed?
What is the full name of the LIDC-IDRI dataset?
Lung Image Database Consortium - Image Database Resource Initiative.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The LIDC-IDRI dataset is a benchmark for lung nodule detection and segmentation and features annotations from up to _____ expert thoracic radiologists per case.
What is the key innovation of the LUNA25 dataset compared to its predecessor, LUNA16?
It extends LUNA16 with state-of-the-art deep learning-based segmentations for nodules (PiNS) and organs (Vista3D).

What is the full name of the HAID resour: In the LUNA25 dataset, which AI model was used for comprehensive organ segmentation?
What is the label number for pulmonary nodules in the LUNA25 label scheme?
What condition is the focus of the MIDRC-RICORD dataset?
What method was used to confirm positive cases in the MIDRC-RICORD-1A dataset, establishing a gold standard?
The U-10 (United-10) dataset is a unified collection of how many public COVID-19 CT datasets?
What novel methodology is included in the U-10 dataset to test AI model transparency and reliability?
Virtual Imaging Trials (VIT) using simulated CT data.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: What is the full name of the landmark clinical trial from which the NLST-3D dataset is derived?
The NLST-3D dataset features 1,192 3D nodule annotations that were converted from over 9,000 2D _____-_____ bounding boxes.
The National Lung Screening Trial demonstrated that annual low-dose CT screening reduces lung cancer mortality by what percentage in high-risk populations?
What is the full name of the DLCS 2024 dataset?
The Duke Lung Cancer Screening dataset.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: What is the key innovation of the DLCS 2024 dataset regarding clinical practice?
It is the first large dataset reflecting contemporary (2015-2021) CT scanner technology and clinical practice.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: What clinical scoring system is used for nodules in the DLCS 2024 dataset?
Lung-RADS (Lung CT Screening Reporting and Data System).

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The MONAI nodule detection algorithm, trained on the _____ dataset, was used to create efficient semiautomated annotations for DLCS 2024.
What is the primary purpose of the DeepLesion dataset?
Universal lesion detection across multiple anatomical regions.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The DeepLesion-1kTest3D dataset is a conversion of the test set into what 3D file format?
Which of the 8 coarse lesion categories is the most common in the DeepLesion test set, making up about 30% of lesions?
What type of clinical measurements, commonly used for tracking tumor size, are provided for each lesion in the DeepLesion dataset?
RECIST Measurements (long and short axis diameters).

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The repository and preprocessing code for HAID are licensed under which license?
Which HAID dataset, originating from the NIH Clinical Center, aims to support universal lesion detection models?
How many patients are included in the IMDCT dataset for indeterminate pulmonary nodules?
The BIMCV-R dataset contains CT scans from how many unique patients?
What is the total number of CT scans available in the BIMCV-R dataset?
In the LUNGx dataset, what is the distribution of benign versus malignant nodules?
Which HAID dataset is a multi-institutional effort from Portugal featuring dual annotation sources from both radiological annotations and text report extractions?
Which U.S. university health system is the source of the DLCS 2024 dataset?
The LIDC-IDRI dataset uses a two-phase annotation process consisting of a blinded read followed by an _____ review.
The U-10 dataset aggregates 10 public COVID-19 datasets and provides them in what ready-to-use file format for TensorFlow?
How were the original annotations for the DeepLesion dataset sourced from clinical practice at the NIH Clinical Center?
They were sourced from PACS system bookmarks.

What is the full name of the HAID resour: The UniToChest dataset features standardized preprocessing where scans are resampled to a uniform spacing of [_____] mm.
The NLST-3D dataset is derived from a trial that screened a high-risk population with a 30+ _____ smoking history.
In the DLCS 2024 dataset, what percentage of scans were withheld as a reserved test set for future challenges?
The LUNA25 dataset uses the _____ deep learning model for precise nodule boundary segmentation.
What is the primary data source for the NSCLC-Radiomics and LIDC-IDRI datasets?
The MIDRC-RICORD dataset consists of two versions: 1A for COVID-19 positive cases and 1B for _____.
Which HAID dataset, with over 12,000 CT volumes, is the largest by volume count due to its aggregation of 10 separate datasets?
What is the modality for all 13 datasets currently available in the HAID resource?
What is the condition studied in the LUNGx dataset?
Which dataset is a large-scale collection focused on COVID-19 from the Valencia Region in Spain?
Which dataset from China focuses specifically on indeterminate pulmonary nodules with 100% pathological confirmation?
The annotation methodology for the DLCS 2024 dataset reduced radiologist annotation time by over what percentage?
Which dataset, organized by Radboud University Medical Center, extends the LUNA16 challenge with AI-generated segmentations?
The NLST was a landmark randomized trial involving how many screening centers across the USA?
In the DeepLesion-1kTest3D dataset, which lesion type corresponds to liver lesions?
What is the license for the LIDC-IDRI dataset?
